Welcome to Model Building Toolkit's documentation!
==================================================

The OpenQuake Model Building Toolkit (oq-mbt) is a package for building
probabilistic seismic hazard source models.  This package is created on top of
and it is fully integrated with the OpenQuake Hazard Modeler's Toolkit (oq-hmtk).
